snippet.title: The Whims of the Gods  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🌋 Add The Whims of the Gods to your wishlist NOW! ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2642390/

Take part in a strategic cooperative adventure for two players. Together you will build and protect the city of an ancient civilization, facing terrifying enemies and the ultimate survival challenge!

🌋 Coming to Steam Early Access in Q3 2024! 

FOLLOW US:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PJGAMESPL
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PJGAMESPL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pjgamespl/
Discord: https://discord.gg/5FRAakY9w6
